member.name: T:DAX.CIM.PhysicalNetworkModel.LineInfo.LineRelation
member.summary: A class used to hold information about the relation between a CIM object and a Line

member.name: P:DAX.CIM.PhysicalNetworkModel.LineInfo.LineRelation.Order
member.summary: In the DSO realm elements are typical numbered starting with the substation with the lowest number - e.g. 100-200#1, 100-200#2 and so forth.
